caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT, v. ERIC BROWN, APPELLANT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied October 2,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE MISSOURI CIRCUIT COURT, JACKSON COUNTY; LEE E. WELLS, JUDGE.Page 526
opinion.attorneys:
David Durbin, Appellate Defender, Anthony C. Cardarella, Asst. Appellate Defender, Kansas City, for appellant.
William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Robert P. Sass, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before LOWENSTEIN, P.J., and CLARK and FENNER, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] The appellant Eric Brown was jury convicted of first degree tampering, ยง 569.080.1(2), and sentenced as a persistent offender. Affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
